abstract: Peter Greenaway discusses the creation and themes of his film 'Prospero's Books'.
description: Margaret Pomeranz, co-host of 'The Movie Show', interviews film-maker Peter Greenaway about his film, 'Prospero's Books'. Greenaway discusses the origins of the project, working with acting legend Sir John Gielgud and some of the creative processes behind the film.
